_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate dashboard copy

page.title: Page title for dashboard. First page user sees after login. Make it welcoming. Ex: 'Dashboard', 'Welcome', 'Home'
page.welcome: Greeting for the user. Personalize if possible. Ex: 'Welcome back!', 'Good to see you!', 'Welcome, {name}!'

stats._note: Section showing user statistics and metrics
stats.sectionTitle: Heading for stats section. Ex: 'Your Activity', 'At a Glance', 'Overview'

quickActions._note: Common actions user might want to take from dashboard
quickActions.title: Section heading for quick action buttons. Ex: 'Quick Actions', 'Get Started'
quickActions.viewBilling: Button to go to billing page. Ex: 'View Billing', 'Manage Subscription'
quickActions.settings: Button to go to account settings. Ex: 'Settings', 'My Account'

empty.title: Heading when user has no data/activity yet. Don't blame user. Ex: 'Welcome! Let's get started', 'Your journey begins here'
empty.description: Helpful text explaining what they can do. Focus on benefits and next steps.
empty.action: Primary CTA to get started. Be specific. Ex: 'Create your first project', 'Set up your account'
